channel.title: Silent Mouse?
channel.description: hey i was just wondering i always see people saying dont use silint mouse i just wanted to know howd does jagex know how and get u banned? they see two mouse cordinates at the same time or sumthing?

item.title: Silent Mouse?
item.dc:creator: @minitual minitual
item.description:
@minitual wrote:

Although, that would be a sweet feature now. I wonder if we could make a Java Macro we could handle enough of the client.class to mask the fact that we’re doing other stuff on the computer. Excuse me if I sound really stupid when I say this because I’ll be the first one to admit that I don’t know much about Java. It just seems to me like an interesting idea even if there’s no way it will work.

Read full topic
